1.content:
Yawning, you stretch out behind your desk. Your 7th grade year began about two weeks ago, and now math class is boring you out of your mind. Still, you're glad to be back among your friends, especially the girls you share this period with. A lot of them, it seems, have grown prettier over the summer, and your pubescent mind entertains frequent fantasies. Not all of them focus on the girls' bodies, though. In fact, a lot of them involve the beautiful feet of your female classmates. You've liked girl feet ever since grade school, and as you notice how the girls are maturing, your desire becomes nearly insatiable.

The teacher drones on with the lesson, still reviewing what you learned last year. Your mind soon wanders, and you find yourself looking around the classroom at the girls, and are happy to see a few of them have their shoes off. Not ten feet from you, a cute blonde slips her feet in and out of her flats. Toward the front of the room, a redhead lazily rubs her socked feet together. It's entrancing, and you decide then and there that you must devise a plan to play with a girl's feet.

It doesn't take you long- you have quite a few female friends that you could easily hang out with after school. The hardest part is just deciding who to go for.

Do you choose...


Chrissy: mid-length brown hair, cute, green eyes, medium height. A bit bossy, but a really adventurous and fun person to be around. She is wearing red Chucks.

Lauren: mid-length blonde hair, fuller build but not fat, medium height. You think she has a bit of a crush on you. She's cheerful and considerate, if a bit stubborn. She's wearing white sneakers.

Melissa: short black hair, prefers the Gothic style. She's quiet and reserved, but you think you can get her to open up. She wears knee-high socks and boots.

Hayley: long red hair, tall, gray eyes, very pretty. She laughs easily, although she is rather quick-tempered and likes to be in control. She's wearing black nylons and black flats.

Natasha: African descent, medium height, with her black hair in a ponytail. She's the laid-back, cool and collected type. She wears black basketball shoes.
1.title: The Day Begins

11.content:
You catch up to Chrissy as she heads to the cafeteria. She greets you with a smile.

"Hey Chrissy," you begin, "you wanna hang out after school?" You suddenly fear she will tease you about wanting to make a move on her, but to your relief she does not.

"Sure!" she says, "You can come over to my house-- my parents are making pizza."

"Sounds good," you say. You head to your locker smiling, happy that Phase One has gone over without a hitch.

After school, you hop on your bike and ride about five blocks to Chrissy's place. She's not out waiting for you, but her mother kindly waves you inside and into the living room. As you enter you notice her soft bare feet, and cannot help but wonder if her daughter received the same genes.

You decide to take a seat on the couch next to Chrissy. "Hey," she greets you cheerfully. You smile in return. "You just get here?" You nod, stealing a glance at her feet, although they are hidden by her red Converse.

"What's the matter?" she asks with a laugh. "You have laryngitis or soemthing?"

"No," you reply, a bit sheepishly. She fidgets in her seat, kicking her feet back and forth a little.

"OK, good," she says. "I was worried you'd been struck speechless by this great choice of a movie," she says sarcastically, making a face secretly so her older sister Patricia can't see. You laugh.

"No," you say. "I'm just a little worn out from that stupid project Mr. Everett is making us do." Again you glance down at her shoes, thinking how great her feet must smell after being in them all day.

"Oh, I know! It's so boring," she says, leaning in a bit. "But hey, it's the weekend now, and I'm not gonna worry about it." You nod in agreement. "And now," she continues, "my feet hurt." You watch, enthralled, as she kicks off her shoes to reveal her cute socked feet.

"Aahh, much better," she says, wiggling her toes a bit. Your mouth is dry, and your heart beats a bit faster. You try to figure out a way to play with Chrissy's feet, and you can think of two possibilities. You can either: a) offer to rub her sore feet (risky but a good payoff), or b) Wait until later, when there is less risk of someone walking in on you.

Which do you do?
11.title: Chrissy

111.content:
Out of the corner of your eye you see Chrissy rubbing her feet together through her white socks, and she looks uncomfortable. You decide to offer her a foot rub. After all, you do like her, and you want to do something nice for her--and touching her feet would make a great bonus! You're nervous, though, and you know you'll have to ask her soon before you lose your nerve.

"Hey Chrissy..." you begin, your face hot and your throat dry with anticipation. She turns back to look at you.

"Um...did you...want me to...rub your feet?" You panic as soon as you say it, worried she might laugh at you--or worse, tell everyone else at school.

Instead she smiles. "Oh, you're so sweet," she says. "I'd love that!" She scoots back on the couch and puts her socked feet in your lap. They look so adorable, and you even catch a little whiff. You take her warm feet in your hands and begin rubbing her heels and arches, then make your way up to the balls of her feet.

"Mmmm...that feels good," she sighs as you move up to her toes. She leans back and closes her eyes, and you relish the feel of her warm feet in your hands. Still, you can't help but wonder how her feet must taste. Do you take the chance of experimenting more?
111.title: Rubbing Chrissy's Feet

1113.content:
After a bit of deliberation, you decide to keep rubbing Chrissy's feet. After all, she looks so happy, and kissing them or something would probably just freak her out. So you continue the massage, pressing your thumbs into her heels and arches, kneading the balls of her feet, and caressing her toes. The whole time, you hear her little moans and sighs of pleasure. You're afraid someone might notice the two of you, but when you look around the room, you see that Patricia is still engrossed in the stupid movie, and her parents are nowhere in sight. Patricia is dangling her flats, but at this point you don't care in the least. All your attention is on Chrissy, and you want her hot little feet more with each passing minute.

Just as you are about to give in and give her feet a quick sniff, you hear Chrissy's mother yell from the other room.

"Pizza's ready!" she calls, and Patricia heads for the kitchen. Chrissy opens her eyes and stretches her toes. The feeling of them moving in your hands gives you the chills.

"Thank you so much," she says. "You give good foot rubs!" She gets up and heads for the kitchen, but you remain in place, for you have devised a simple plan.

"You coming?" she asks.

"In a minute," you reply, pretending to tie your shoe. She nods and disappears around the corner. No sooner has she left than you crouch down next to her discarded Chucks, which look worn but still in decent shape. Your hands trembling a little, you grasp the right shoe and bring it to your nose. You breathe deep, inhaling the scent of young foot sweat mixed with canvas. It is intoxicating, and you take several more deep breaths, before paranoia gets the best of you. You rise and head for the kitchen, hoping no one will notice your erection.

You sit across from Chrissy at the table, talking about random things, but of course her feet are still very much on your thoughts. When you pretend to swat a mosquito under the table, you see she has them crossed at the ankles, curling her toes slowly. You swallow hard, trying to keep your composure. You must be doing a good job of it, too, because Chrissy does not notice how distracted you are.

When you both finish eating, Chrissy turns to you. "You wanna play some games?"

"Sure," you say, not paying full attention. You follow her up to her room, and she shuts the door behind you. It takes you a moment to realize Chrissy is still standing right in front of you with a rather stern expression on her face.

"I have a question," she says seriously, advancing another step so she is inches from your face. "Do you like my feet?"

That snaps you back to reality. Your mind races for an endless moment. She has caught you. Do you admit to your fetish, in the hopes that she will indulge you? Or do you deny it, hoping to save your honor and try your luck with someone else?
1113.title: Continuing the Massage

11131.content:
"I...what?" you stammer uselessly, searching frantically for a way out of what has just become a nightmare. Chrissy stands with one hand on her hip, looking irritably up at you. How does she know? You were so discreet!

...Weren't you?

Finally you sigh in defeat. "Yeah...I do," you groan.

"What's that?" she mocks you. "I didn't catch that."

You clench your teeth. "I like your feet."

She smiles wickedly. "Ha! I knew it! Ever since Wendy and I saw you drooling over Hayley's feet at lunch, I knew you were a foot freak!" She begins to laugh, and by now you wish you could crawl into a hole and die.

"Why don't you go take another whiff of my shoes? Oh, wait 'til I tell Wendy!" she laughs, dashing to the corner of her room and picking up a worn pair of pink socks. Your blood runs cold when she says that.

"NO!" you cry. "You can't tell anyone!" She ignores you, shoving the socks in your face. In spite of your panic, you stop to take a deep breath. The scent is rich and wonderful.

"That's right," Chrissy says. "Sniff my stinky socks." She slowly walks backward to her bed, socks in hand, and you follow her, zombielike. Reaching the bed, she sits, and hands the socks to you, watching as you bury your face in them. After a few moments she holds out her hand.

"All right," she says, "give me those." She snatches them from you, but before you can protest, she holds up her socked feet. "Now that you've gotten a sample, get to work on the real thing!" She giggles, wiggling her toes in front of you, then shoves her warm soles into your face.

"Smell 'em!" she orders, and she doesn't need to tell you twice. You inhale full force, drinking in the odor of her sweaty preteen feet. The scent is just the right mixture of leather and sweat, and you can't get enough. Chrissy curls her little toes around your nose and you continue to sniff them, the smell making you a bit lightheaded but more aroused than you have ever been. "Do they smell good?" she asks.

"Mmmmpphhmmm," you reply, and she giggles again. With a last big sniff, you begin to kiss her socked soles, from her heels to her toes, relishing the moisture of sweat on your lips. To your disappointment, she stop you.

"My feet are hot," she whines mockingly. "Take my socks off." Your heart pounds even faster than before when she says that. You grasp the ankle of her left sock and tug lightly on it, while Chrissy leans her head back and closes her eyes. You pull the sock down her ankle to reveal her soft heel, then grasp it at the toe, and peel it off. She wiggles her bare toes in the cool air, and you see she has painted them bright red. Your mouth watering, you slip off her other sock, and before you now is a pair of cute bare feet. Chrissy sighs realxingly but gives you no further orders.

What do you do?



Check out this link for a picture of Chrissy's feet: http://tycho1989.deviantart.com/#/d47q3o...
11131.title: No Use Denying It

11132.content:
"Uh...n-no..." you stammer.

"Oh, really?" she says with an almost mocking softness. She brings up each leg in turn, pulling off her socks. They slip gracefully off her soft feet. You look back at her face before her attention returns to you.

"Yeah..." you say. "Why do you ask?" Her expression is strange, a mix of amusement and suspicion. In your embarrassment, your gaze drops to the floor, where her socks lie in a pile near her cute bare feet. She wiggles her red-painted toes into the plush carpet.

"That." Your eyes bolt back to her face, but it's too late. "You keep looking at my feet," she says. "Why?"

Your knees trembling, your throat dry, you scramble for an answer you know will never come. Your panicked mind knows only to get away, only to hide. "I'm not!" you say, too loudly for it to be the truth. "I don't like your feet," you say to the wall.

Chrissy says nothing. She just gives you that same strange stare for an endless moment, before suddenly turning away. For a split-second you think you may be safe...until she speaks again.

"Wait here," she says, and you find you can only acquiesce. "Patricia!" she calls, marching off down the hall. You watch her soles as she leaves. For a moment you sit there, the horrible realization creeping up on you, of just how bad this could get if she told Patricia...or her friends...or the rest of the school... Your stomach lurches, and you swallow hard.

And then you see them. Chrissy's white socks, still lying in the pile by her bed where she left them; one turned inside out, inviting you.

You automatically take half a step toward them, before you remember that being caught smelling Chrissy's dirty socks would surely cement your fate of being labelled the "foot freak." But if Chrissy really does believe you and drops it, you'll have to be on your guard from here on out, and this would be your last chance to get anywhere near her feet.

So, what's it going to be?

12.content:
you decide to meet the big girl Lauren, she's cheerful, your somewhat out going, she's sweet, your strong,she does like eating a good bit more then most girls do, and you like to cook almost like how your mom would teach you.

granted you really aren't that good at it, you honestly can't make pancakes without burning them,and when you make bacon the house smells like bacon for a few days because you let the bacon burn,you'd make a terrible chef but would be fun to have around in the kitchen.

you wait for lunch time to meet with Lauren,you don't have the current class with her and well yes she does sit with other girls who do think your kinda cute,the target is of course Lauren since she's your actual friend.

when it reaches lunch time you walk all around the cafeteria looking for Lauren and the people she's sitting with,it really isn't all that hard.

yeah there are some big girls but you can tell them apart easily and Lauren is no exception.

sitting at a table by herself is the love able girl you wanted to see herself, Lauren.

Lauren is an all around nice looking girl, well kept blond hair, a nice smile,a cute face,and welcome dress code for her, she wore a pink and green striped shirt with the words "booty train" tight blue jeans,and of course her signature white running sneakers which she's worn for...a year or so now?

she wore that pair for a long time that's for certain but now is not the time for time,now is the time to go over there and pop that question.

you walk over to where Lauren is sitting standing in-front of an empty seat right next to her at her table and ask "can i sit here?" loud enough for her to hear but quiet enough to not interrupt her eating.

"sorry but that spot is saved" she spoke not looking at you still eating the slice of pizza she got from the cafeteria.

"for someone like me?" i spoke putting a hand on her shoulder and a smile on my face,i might not have what it takes to go all out with my liking for feet but i know how make a girl blush that's for sure.

she actually spit some of her pizza out from surprise that either came from the bold choice of words or the fact that the guy she likes just asked to sit next to her.

a small blush popped on her face as she realized what happened and how she spat out what she had in her mouth before she spoke saying "yeah..for someone like you" she spoke as she took another bite of her pepperoni slice.

"thanks Lauren[you sit down right next to her and open up your lunch box pulling out some of the left over burnt things you happened to make a few days ago like that burnt bacon,a bag of burnt potato slices with salt,and some peanut butter cookies you made yesterday oh and don't forget that bottle of apple juice,oh god,apple juice] and by the way,do you wanna hang out after school?" i spoke to her once more as she once again spat out her pizza only this time it was the last of it and she had no more food left.

after gaining her bearings with a blush on her face she said "oh yeah Tommy! (the character who is interacting with Lauren is going to be named Tommy for the sake of convenience since this is a fetish story and not exactly a self insert) i'd love to hang out with you after school! my place okay with you?" she spoke with a smile as you took out a peanut butter cookie.

"yeah your place is okay[shows the peanut butter cookie to her] want it since i kinda made you spit your lunch out?" you spoke not even earning a word as she grabbed the cookie from your hand and shoved the whole thing in her mouth like a squirrel,it was actually kind of adorable.

"guess that's a yes then" you marked with a smile.

after the school day was over you walked with Lauren all the way to her house from the middle school since her bus didn't go to where you lived and man you wish one of you had a bike.

the walk was at least 20 minutes if not more since she lived a long ways away from the school and there just weren't that many short cuts on the way.

once you were finally at Lauren's house she knocked on the front door and after a moment a women who looked a good bit like Lauren opened the door.

"Laura where the heck were you? having a boyfriend is no excuse to just walk home,you could've been mugged!" the women spoke with a little enthesis on the word "boyfriend" when she saw you right next to Lauren.

Lauren simply walked past her mom and towards the living room couch saying "well i wasn't counting on you picking me and Tommy up so i decided to walk home with my hunk of a man as a body guard" she spoke before she sat on the couch with her back pack on the side as she was too tired from walking to bring it to her room.

"and no Mrs.Halter i'm not your daughter's boyfriend,at least not right now" you tell her as you walk over to where she was sitting on the couch.

"shouldn't you bring your things to your room?" you ask her as she tries to hand wave it off.

"yeah but i'm too tired to bring it upstairs to my room" she spoke as she put her feet on the coffee table.

then you have one crazy idea that almost no truly sane person would think in this scenario.

it started simple,just take your back pack off,pick up her back pack with yours taking her's place,put her back pack on,then put an arm under her legs,the other behind her back,then pick her up bridal style.

walking over to the door Lauren reached out turning the handle with you quickly going inside and sitting Lauren on her bed before falling over from the burden,you were strong but no one your age is strong enough to carry someone heavy as her forever,but it was satisfying to bring her up all the way here.

she got off her bed and closed the door asking "are you okay?" worried about your health.

you sat there exhausted as she sat on her bed not really knowing what to do now.

133.title: Other

Take her side.  "No, I don't smell anything."
14.content:
You look for Hayley at lunch, but she's not at her usual table. Frustrated, you take decide to just take your time packing up at last bell. Hopefully you'll run into her.

Three hours later, you're slamming your locker shut and trekking out of the building with the rest of the students, eager to start the weekend- the sooner the better. You crane your neck to see above the crowd, and then you see her, just passing through the double doors as you round the corner. She stops outside and checks something on her phone, giving you the perfect opportunity to catch up.

"Hey, Hayley," you say. She looks up from her phone at you, smiling wide.

"Hey!" she returns the greeting. "I see you had lab today," she says, pointing to the crease your goggles left above your nose. "You managed not to blow up the school-- that's impressive." You both laugh at that. Glancing down, you spot a nyloned heel popping slightly out of her shoe. Before you can even stutter your invitation, she speaks again.

"I'm meeting some friends at the mall. You wanna come?" You can't believe the coincidence.

"Who's going?" you ask, trying to play it cool.

"Suzie and Liz."

You get a real jolt from that. Not only will you be at the mall with three hot girls, but you'll have triple the chance to play with their feet! Your knees already beginning to shake, you heartily agree.


Two hours later, you and the girls are chilling back at Hayley's place, watching some TV in her finished basement. Hayley and Liz are on the couch, Suzie is sitting in the beanbag chair, and you have taken a spot on the floor. You'd played it off like you were being gracious, but of course you were looking to get as close to those pretty preteen feet as you could. Soon, out of the corner of your eye, you see it.

Liz is working the toe of her right sneaker under the heel of her left. She pushes on the shoe gradually, pulling back with her left leg, freeing her socked foot from her shoe with a soft *fffwshh* sound. She gives a cute little sigh, wiggling her toes through her white socks. Then she kicks off her other shoe the same way, wiggling the toes of her other foot. You try your best to watch the television instead, and for a moment you are successful...then an all-to-familiar odor wafts into your nostrils, like a rich mixture of cheese, leather, and sweat, and you feel your erection growing.

"Eeww," says Suzie. "Liz, put your shoes back on. Your feet smell!"

"No!" Liz says, grinning nervously. "They're too small! They're killing my feet!" Hayley also has her hand over her nose. You grin--partially because of the amusing scene, but mainly because the scent is stronger now, and you are drinking it in. It takes all your self control to not put your face between Liz's sweaty toes and inhale full force.

"C'mon," Liz protests. "He doesn't think they stink." She looks over at you. "Do my feet stink?"

You're in a tough spot. For a guy without a foot fetish, of course, this would be simple- you'd say yes and tease her about her rotten feet. But it's so hard to play it off like that when you know it would be so far from the truth...

143.content:
"I don't smell anything," you say, shrugging to suggest it would be a non-issue even if you did. You can see it won't be that easy, since all three girls are clearly deciding just what your casual dismissal means. You realize that one guy hanging out with three girls can't escape this brand of scrutiny for very long, but you suddenly have an idea how to play it off.

"You're, like, right there," Suzie teases you, her legs stretched out in front of her. "You're being gassed to death, Mr. Chivalry, admit it!" She twists precariously on the beanbag to nudge you with her foot, smirking. She often goes in for nylons like Hayley, but you've noticed she likes working her collection of Chucks, wearing a different pair daily; red, today. Being nudged like that was pleasantly unexpected, but it's a challenge to hold yourself together. You want Hayley and Suzie to get their shoes off as well, and you'd be more than happy to help.

You decide to take a gamble.

"No, I really don't smell anything," you tell the girls, sitting up a little straighter to suggest you've got something important to say. "Congenital anosmia. I can't smell anything at all. So if Liz's feet are really whiff right now, I have no way of knowing. I'll have to take your word for it."

It's a calculated risk. The girls might be uncomfortable with your 'condition,' but then they might also be fascinated. In which case, you hope you can turn it to your advantage.

"Wow, you can't smell anything, really?" Hayley asks, leaning forward. Liz and Suzie look just as curious, so you attempt to masterfully downplay their growing curiosity with another shrug.

"I don't think it's that big of a deal," you say. "It's more like being colorblind, but for smells. I've been this way all my life, so it seems normal to me."

"Yeah, but wouldn't that mess up your sense of taste, too?!" Suzie asks, eyes wide. "Pizza must taste like cardboard. Everything must taste like cardboard! I couldn't handle that."

The girls prattle in excited horror over what their favorite foods would be like, robbed of flavor. You get in a comment about how the basic taste receptors in your tongue aren't affected. Meanwhile, you're taking as many subtle sniffs as you can manage, leaning in the direction of Liz's cooling socked feet as discreetly as possible. Her feet smell even better now that you have everyone distracted, but you're still hoping for the big payoff.

"Is that why you've had stuff go off in the lab before?" Hayley asks, seizing on the idea. "Because you couldn't smell what you were mixing together? You could have blown yourself up! What if there's a gas leak in your house and you're all alone?"

"I think we've got the cure right here," Suzie says, smiling, and you know she's coming to your rescue. "Why don't you . . . "
143.title: You're noncommittal on Liz's foot smell

14321.title: Smell Suzie's feet

choices: They make you smell their feet
1433.content:
You look down at Suzie's battered Chucks, with their frayed laces and worn-out soles, and you feel your mouth begin to dry up. Your heart rate increases, the adrenaline making you quiver with excitement. Somehow, you find the strength to contain yourself, and you give a nonchalant sigh, suggesting this is all a waste of time.

"If it will prove a point," you say. Suzie flashes you a sinister grin, one that suggests you have no idea what you are getting yourself into, and begins unlacing her Chucks. From the couch, you hear Liz and Hayley trading loud whispers between fits of giggles. Your palms begin to sweat. You watch Suzie's fingers work, the moment seemingly endless. At last, Suzie pulls off her shoes, and the smell hits you instantly. Between that and the sight of her feet, you literally feel your heart stop. She's wearing footies- your favorite- and hot pink ones at that! She gets comfortable in the beanbag chair, putting her hands behind her head.

"Let's see you smell those," she says with a cocky grin.

Your mind is still in a bit of a fog from the smell--not one of socks or leather, but purely of feet--but you manage to reach out and grasp her right shoe with trembling hands. Pulling the tongue back, you bring it to your nose and inhale slowly, deeply.

The odor floods your nostrils, a fermented mix of dirty canvas, popcorn and wine; your exhalation is husky and rough. You inhale again, full force, closing your eyes to lose yourself in the rich, pungent stink. You stick out your tongue and lap hungrily at the sweaty insole. By now you can't help yourself--you moan a little into the canvas as you drink it in.

Wait...

Cold panic strikes you as you remember where you are. Slowly, you lower the shoe, revealing three wide-eyed girls, all giggling and flashing each other some very knowing smiles. Your face hot, you follow their gaze, and only then do you notice the large erection straining against your jeans.
1433.title: Sniffing Suzie's Chucks

14332.content:
"No way!" exclaims Suzie.

         All three of the girls are staring at you with very wide smiles on their faces. They are trying to hold back giggles.

         "You sure seems to be enjoying yourself for not being able to smell anything Mr. Footboy," says Liz. "You had better crawl over here and start worshipping my feet. Otherwise everyone at school is gonna know about your little addiction."

         You quickly crawl over to Liz's feet not wanting the entire school to find out about your fetish. Your social status would crash. At least you get to enjoy these girls' feet, right? Liz puts her feet in front of your face.

         "Smell my feet, footboy!" yells Liz.

         You deeply inhale the smell of Liz's feet. You smell cheese that seems like it's been sitting out in the hot sweltering sun for months. You can't get enough of the smell, but you're very worried that the girls might share you're secret with everyone at school. If this happened, you could pretty much say goodbye to your social life. The tent in your pants didn't help the scene at all. You continued to breath in the think scent emanating from Liz's beautiful feet.

         "How are you still alive?" laughed Haley. "Liz's feet smell so bad they could knock out an entire elephant!"

         Liz stuck your nose in between her toes. You smelled the cheesy odor very deeply, and the smell was very strong, but also the best thing you had ever smelled. You couldn't get enough.

         "Alright that's enough Liz. Anymore of your feet and he'll pass out, said Suzie. "He should smell one of our feet."
14332.title: They make you smell their feet

143321.content:
"You can have him next, Suzie," says Hayley.

"Get over here, footboy," says Suzie, kicking her Chucks aside to give you more room. As you approach, she raises her footied feet in the air, bright pink soles facing you; toes wiggling, beckoning. The scent of her old sneakers is still hanging in the air at the spot where you sit a second time. With a poisonous smile, Suzie places her feet in your lap, then leans back in the beanbag chair to relax.

"Ooohhhh..." she sighs. "I've been in those shoes aaallll day. I bet my feet reek."

She's right. The smell of her sweaty feet is not as rich as Liz's, but instead is sharper and a bit more sour. It has more depth. Slowly, you wrap your hands around her warm feet, softly caressing them through the thin footies. You can see and feel her cute little toes through the fabric.

"Mmmmmm...that feels good," she moans, and for a moment you seem to have broken down Suzie's sadistic persona...but what she does next lets you know you're dead wrong.

"It's too bad you're not in my English class," she says, pulling her feet away before you can say a word. "Last period, long hot day...I kick my shoes off in there all the time! Just sit there in my footies...give my toes some air...bet you'd give anything to be under my desk." She holds up her feet again, just out of your reach, toes curling back and forth. Your breath comes in heavy pants, and you want Suzie's hot little feet so badly it hurts.

"God, that would be great," she continues. "Just feeling you sniffing between my toes...mmmmmm..." She grins, inching her feet so, so slowly toward your ravenous nose and tongue.

"And sometimes," she whispers, "I take my socks off too. With my toes." That finally does it.

You lunge forward and grab Suzie's feet, forcing your nose into her footied soles, sucking in the odor for all you're worth. She bursts into cruel laughter, forming a tent over your nose with her toes. "That's it," she sneers, "smell my stinky feet!" The smell is heavenly; the deep, layered scent of her feet floods your senses and a muffled moan escapes your drooling mouth. To your surprise and Suzie's amusement, your hips begin to buck involuntarily.

"Hey!" shouts Suzie. "You better not be that close yet!" You assure her you're not; it just feels so good to be at her feet. "Good," she says. "Take those off and smell my bare feet."

"Hey, he hasn't done me yet," Hayley objects. "Quit hogging him." She turns to you. "Don't think I won't rat you out just because we're friends," she warns.

You want to give a new pair of feet a try, of course (and it would be an absolute nightmare if Hayley spread this little incident around), but Suzie's are so delicious, and she just ordered you to take her footies off...
143321.title: Fun with Suzie's Feet

info.brief_description: Have fun with your 7th grade classmates' feet.  3,000 GPs for the best additions!
info.description:
You're a boy in 7th grade, and you're trying to get at the feet of some of your classmates. You can't help but wonder what kind of opportunities you may have to play with the girls' feet...

GENERAL RULES:

Girls' feet only (at least for now).
Keep it realistic. If you want to do shrinking or something, please clear it with me first.
A little violence is okay if you want, but nothing extreme.
Please add full chapters. No one or two sentence entries.
Be courteous and have fun.

NOTE that this story may eventually include illustrations! I'll post the links as I complete them.

Yes, you can get up to 3,000 GPs for additions, but note that this is for the best chapters. Every full chapter added will get something, but the award is proportional to quality.
